documentation.text:
@dev Transfers tokens held by the time lock to the beneficiary. Will only succeed if invoked after the release time.
 @param id Index of locked tokens.

lock(address,string,string,uint256,uint2.details: Transfers tokens to be held in period of time.

params.amount: Amount of token to be staked.
params.name: Name of locked tokens.

release(uint256).details: Transfers tokens held by the time lock to the beneficiary. Will only succeed if invoked after the release time.
